summary:
Adds new armor, Swift Armor - set. This is the armor blessed by Sithis himself. It adds much more power to assassin wearers.
- Also contains Archmage armor replacer.
- Whole set is male version only
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds armor blessed by Sithis himself to the game. It\'s lore friendly and it suits the dark brotherhood style.  This is very overpowered armor.


Includes:
Swift Armor - Base stats linked in screenshot picture, _Increases One-Handed skill_
Swift Bracers - Base stats linked in screenshot picture _Increases One-Handed skill_
Swift Boots - Base stats linked in screenshot picture _Wearer is muffled_


Bonus: *Replace for Archmage armor


How to obtain:
Armor is located in Whiterun, Breezehome. Right on the floor when you come in.


Requires:
Skyrim
-optional dawnguad

Installation:
Extract files -textures and plug.in- to your data folder. \\Program Files\\TesV - Skyrim\\Data
- enable \"swiftdbsithisarmor\" in the launcher under Data Files tab.

Unistallation:
Delete textures from mod and plug-in file.


Permission:
You cannot re-upload the file.


I hope you\'ll enjoy wearing this armor. :D
author: iiwemm
